item.title: EP 187 - "Come Play With Me": The Candy Woman Of Texas
item.itunes:title: "Come Play With Me": The Candy Woman Of Texas
item.description:
A cuddly cryptid, a ocean full of mysteries, and the crazy but possibly true story of a woman who loved candy so much, she used it to kidnap and kill children!

Vote For Your Favorite Paranormal Podcast: Dead Rabbit Radio!

https://paranormalitymag.com/vote25/

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

Dead Rabbit Radio Wiki

https://deadrabbitradio.pods.monster/doku.php?id=Welcome

 

Links:

Cookie Monster

https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monstruo_de_las_Galletas

Woman Swept Away by Wave 1.5 Years Ago Recently Found Unconscious on Nearby Beach, Wearing the Same Clothes as When She Disappeared

http://www.odditycentral.com/news/woman-swept-away-by-wave-1-5-years-ago-recently-found-unconscious-on-nearby-beach-wearing-the-same-clothes-as-when-she-disappeared.html

Woman who vanished after 'being swept out to sea' off of Indonesia is found unconscious by relatives on the same beach 18 MONTHS later, still wearing the same clothes

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-5916893/Woman-swept-ocean-Indonesia-turns-alive-18-MONTHS-later.html

This Woman Disappeared into the Sea and was Later Found Alive in the Same Place. What Exactly Happened?

http://www.maritimeherald.com/2018/this-woman-disappeared-into-the-sea-and-was-later-found-alive-in-the-same-place-what-exactly-happened/

The Candy Lady

https://urbanlegendsonline.com/the-candy-lady/

Did the ‘Candy Lady’ abduct and murder children in Texas?

https://crberryauthor.wordpress.com/2017/07/06/did-the-candy-lady-abduct-and-murder-children-in-texas/

TERRIFYING CANDY LADY LURES KIDS TO HORRIFIC DEATH IN CREEPIEST TEXAS URBAN LEGEND

https://1063thebuzz.com/terrifying-candy-lady-lures-kids-to-horrific-death-in-creepiest-texas-urban-legend-ever/

Clara Crane

https://www.ancestry.com/genealogy/records/clara-crane_41491814

History Of Clara Crane

http://historyofclaracrane.tumblr.com/

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
